Fantastic group to work with. Highly recommend. Very economical and high touch service. Their team was out at our house the day after called them and everything was fixed perfectly. Will refer RMC to everyone we know moving forward. Response from the owner 9 months ago Thank you, Lane. We appreciate the opportunity. We’re here for you when you need us.

I could not be more satisfied with RMC Roofing and Construction! I hired them to install a new roof and new gutters. The  experience was flawless! My experience with RMC Roofing was incredible. They were extremely professional and they made the whole process completely seamless while going above and beyond to get me everything I needed and more from my insurance company.
